concept.title: SDC Records Data Format
concept.shortdesc: SDC Records is a file data format used by the to generate error files for the pipeline. It is also a data format option for output files.

conbody.p: SDC Recordsdata formatUse the SDC Records format to process files produced by another pipeline, or to produce files that you might pass to another pipeline.
The SDC Record Files destination writes all records using the SDC Records format. You can also use Hadoop FS and the Kafka Producer to write SDC Records files.
The Directory and Kafka Consumer origins both process SDC Records files.
